DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate compare image obtain coronary imaging catheter use treatment coronary blockage clinical set patient model .
DOC.brief_title: In Vitro In Vivo Comparison Between Intravascular Ultrasound ( IVUS ) Systems
DOC.criteria: â‰¥18 year age Scheduled coronary angiogram Royal Adelaide Hospital . Women must nonlactating childbearing potential ( 1 year post menopausal surgically sterilize [ total hysterectomy , bilateral tubal ligation , bilateral oophorectomy ] ) . Target artery must > 2 mm accommodate IVUS catheter . IVUS must clinically indicate indeterminate angiographic lesion artery ( 40 % 70 % angiographic stenosis ) Cardiogenic shock Contraindications intracoronary nitroglycerin ( hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy ; cerebral hemorrhage , head trauma ; concomitant sildenafil , tadalafil vardenafil use ) Known coronary artery spasm Significant bleeding risk ( i.e . previous hemorrhagic stroke , active peptic ulcer disease ) Bleeding diathesis Significant renal impairment ( patient exclude calculated creatinine clearance < 30 mL/min )
